attributes.action: allow small business outside the main high streets and shoppping areas the equal opertunity's to fair trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
small business who wish to change there business premises they have bought who hit a brick wall when applying for a change of use of there property,
eg to be able to sell hot food from a almost obsolete corner shop business within the local community when there is no objection from the local community who are wanting there villages to thrive again, creating local jobs for local people and are in full support, and be allowed to compete with high street shops by allowing equal oppertunity's to all commercial property owner's outside the main precints and high street, why this bylaw was ever introduced puzzles me and has restricted wealth growth in small ex mining community's , fair trade for all i say give us a chance weve paid our dues
